title: HTML Canvas Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML Canvas element and graphics programming

questions.question: What is the default size of <canvas> if no width/height is given?
What does getContext("2d") do?
questions.explanation: getContext('2d') returns the 2D rendering context, which provides methods for drawing shapes, text, and images.

questions.question: Which method draws a filled rectangle?
questions.explanation: fillRect() draws a rectangle filled with the current fillStyle color or pattern.

questions.question: What is required for <canvas> to actually show graphics?
questions.explanation: Canvas requires JavaScript to draw anything - the element itself is just a blank drawing surface.

questions.question: Which is not something you can draw on <canvas>?
questions.explanation: <canvas> is for graphics only, not HTML structure.
